title: Private Credit Grows in Singapore as Australia’s IFM Joins List
description: Singapore has attracted another international asset manager to set up shop, adding to a growing list as the city-state seeks to strengthen its presence in the burgeoning $1.7 trillion private credit market.
content: Singapore has attracted another international asset manager to set up shop, adding to a growing list as the city-state seeks to strengthen its presence in the burgeoning $1.7 trillion private credit market.
